name: Rose Petal and Vanilla Tea
description: This is a sweet infusion with nothing more than dried rose petals, a vanilla bean and honey. You can find dried rose petals in Middle Eastern markets.
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, halal, healthy, kosher, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, fall, winter

recipeInstructions.text: Place the dried rose petals and vanilla bean and seeds in a large measuring cup or teapot and pour on the boiling water. Stir in the honey, cover and let steep for 30 minutes. Strain and serve warm, or reheat and serve hot.
